channel.title: Help with project16 v4.5
channel.description: i have a problem that when you die you log out and have to log back in and all your things are at castle wars. another thing is the xp is too fast and i dont know how to make it less xp at once[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 03:37:55 PM[/size][hr]i found out when i die it says on the server report could not find connection vortex dropping packet

item.title: Help with project16 v4.5
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Um… you have to find the attack method. Its probably public void Attack or something, but specifically

(client)p.player.playerLevel[3]-=misc.random;

Something like that, search for isAttackingOn. Basically this means the player your fighting takes damage.
Then find addSkillXP(
it should have 3 as one of the arguments, and another integer as the other. Divide the other integer by what you want the XP gained per hit to be.

Read full topic

@blade1234 wrote:

that worked but how can i lower attack exp

item.title: Help with project16 v4.5
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Hmmm… search for something like

if(isDead){
teletoX = some_number
teletoY = some_other_number

Change those teletoX and teletoY to what you want to be the respawn point.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with project16 v4.5
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

No, just comment the line out or delete it entirely. If you put // before the line, the compiler wont record that line next time its run.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with project16 v4.5
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Blade - go into player.java and search for “could not find connection vertex dropping packet!” and you should see something right above or right below that sayiing dissconnected = true;

change that line to " //dissconnected = true; " then save and recompile & restart the server.

Read full topic
